title: Homeopathy - Chiropractor, Holistic Doctor, Homeopathic Health & Nutrition
description: Holistic Health and Wellness provides Nutrition, Chiropractic, Homeopathic, and Wellness to the Greater Sparta, NC Area. Dr. Todd Smith, DC, DABCI, brings over 30 years of experience to his patients seeking to improve their quality of life.
sitename: Chiropractor, Holistic Doctor, Homeopathic Health & Nutrition
cleaned_text: Homeopathy came to the United States in 1828 and is practiced extensively in other countries such as England, India, France and Germany. Homeopathy uses minute amounts of remedies which stimulate the body's own immune system to heal itself. It requires comprehension of an elaborate philosophy of health and disease, along with the systematic study of hundreds of homeopathic remedies. Homeopathy involves a careful study of the individualized characteristics of a given health problem as it manifests through the individual. This allows the practitioner to select the best remedy that will match and therefore resonate with the individual. Homeopathy Homeopathy has been found to be effective with both acute illnesses and with chronic diseases (e.g.. heart disease, allergies, Crohn's disease, hyperthyroidism, menstrual problems, and many more).
